amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to increase and decrease the National Surface Transportation and Innovative Finance Bureau in recognition of the DOT Thriving Communities Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to increase and decrease funding by $10,550,000 for the National Surface Transportation and Innovative Finance Bureau in recognition of the Department of Transportation Thriving Communities Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 214 (Roll no. 603).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 214 (Roll no. 603).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
